home.title: AIDE+ | Discover all the benefits you're entitled to in France
home.description: AIDE+ guides you through administrative procedures in France. Free simulation, personalized AI assistant and step-by-step guides.
home.keywords: France benefits, CAF, APL, RSA, administrative procedures, foreigners France, benefits simulation

hero.subtitle: AIDE+ supports you in your administrative procedures in France with personalized simulation and an AI assistant available 24/7.

simulation.cardDescription: Select your region to start the free simulation.
simulation.note: Your data is anonymous and secure

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about AIDE+.
faq.a1: Basic simulation is completely free. To access unlimited AI assistant and advanced features, check out our Premium plans.
faq.a2: Absolutely. All your data is encrypted and securely stored. We never share your information with third parties.
faq.a3: Answer a few questions about your situation (age, status, income...) and our algorithm automatically calculates the benefits you're eligible for.
faq.q4: Can I use AIDE+ if I don't speak French?
faq.a4: Yes! AIDE+ is available in French and English. You can change the language at any time.
faq.a5: You can contact us via the Contact page or directly by email. Premium users get priority support.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

pricing.label: Pricing

pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade to Premium whenever you want.

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about French benefits...
chat.disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.
chat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm AIDE+, your personal assistant for navigating French administrative systems. I can help you with:

• **Government benefits** - CAF, APL, RSA, Prime d'activité, etc.
• **Administrative procedures** - Visas, residence permits, CPAM, etc.
• **Housing assistance** - Finding accommodation, guarantors, tenant rights

How can I assist you today?
chat.errorResponse: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

seo.title: Pricing
seo.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Start free and upgrade to Premium for full access to all features.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. You will keep access until the end of your billing period.
faq.a2: Absolutely. We use Stripe for payment processing, which ensures the highest level of security for your transactions.
faq.q3: Can I switch from monthly to yearly?
faq.a3: Yes, you can switch between billing periods at any time. The change will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.q4: What happens to my data if I cancel?
faq.a4: Your data is always yours. If you cancel, you can export all your data before your subscription ends.
